query:
SELECT name
FROM wines w 
ORDER BY ratings_average DESC 
LIMIT 10
description: Highlight the wines that have the highest ratings

query:
SELECT ROUND(SUM(wn.ratings_average * wn.ratings_count)/SUM(wn.ratings_count),2) AS avg_rating,
ct.name as country
FROM wines wn
JOIN regions rg ON wn.region_id = rg.id 
JOIN countries ct ON rg.country_code = ct.code 
GROUP BY ct.name 
ORDER BY 1 DESC 
LIMIT 1
description: Select the country with the biggest average wine rating

query:
SELECT ws.name 
FROM wineries ws 
JOIN wines wn ON ws.id = wn.winery_id 
GROUP BY ws.name 
ORDER BY SUM(wn.ratings_average*wn.ratings_count)/SUM(wn.ratings_count) DESC 
LIMIT 3
description: Select best three wineries based on biggest average wine rating

query:
SELECT DISTINCT(w.name) 
FROM keywords_wine kw
JOIN wines w ON w.id = kw.wine_id 
WHERE keyword_id IN (
	SELECT id 
	FROM keywords
	WHERE name IN ("coffee", "toast", "green apple", "cream", "citrus")) AND count >= 10
description: Find the wines that have following keywords in them: coffee, toast, green apple, cream, and citrus; which are confirmed by at least 10 people

query:
WITH top_grapes AS (
    SELECT name
    FROM grapes
    WHERE id IN (
    	SELECT grape_id
    	FROM most_used_grapes_per_country
    	GROUP BY grape_id  
    	ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
    	LIMIT 3)
)

SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT 
        wn.name AS wine_name,
        tg.name AS grape_name,
        RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY tg.name ORDER BY wn.ratings_average DESC) AS wine_rank
    FROM wines wn
    JOIN top_grapes tg ON wn.name LIKE '%' || tg.name || '%'
) ranked_wines
WHERE wine_rank <= 5;

SELECT ROUND(SUM(wn.ratings_average * wn.ratings_count)/SUM(wn.ratings_count),2) AS avg_rating,
ct.name as country
FROM wines wn
JOIN regions rg ON wn.region_id = rg.id 
JOIN countries ct ON rg.country_code = ct.code 
GROUP BY ct.name 
ORDER BY 1 DESC 
LIMIT 10
description: Show the 10 countries that have the biggest average wine rating. It's a weighted average, for correction.

query:
SELECT ROUND(SUM(vs.ratings_average * vs.ratings_count)/SUM(vs.ratings_count),2) AS avg_rating,
ct.name as country
FROM vintages vs
JOIN wines wn ON vs.wine_id = wn.id  
JOIN regions rg ON wn.region_id = rg.id 
JOIN countries ct ON rg.country_code = ct.code 
GROUP BY ct.name 
ORDER BY 1 DESC 
LIMIT 10
description: The 10 countries with the highest average vintage ratings, again weighted.

query:
SELECT vs.name AS Name, vs.ratings_average AS rating
FROM wines wn
JOIN vintages vs ON wn.id  = vs.wine_id 
WHERE wn.name LIKE "%Cabernet Sauvignon%"
ORDER BY vs.ratings_average DESC
LIMIT 5
description: Select the 5 best rated vintages containing Cabernet Sauvignon
